message: Thank you for reaching out to us regarding your loft extension project on your bungalow. We’re excited to help you with your scaffolding needs! For a loft extension, we typically provide a scaffold setup that ensures safety and efficiency for both your builders and the overall project. Here’s what we propose:

proposals.description: We’ll conduct an on-site survey to assess the specific requirements of your property and the extension project.
Based on the survey, we’ll design a scaffold structure tailored to your bungalow’s dimensions and the loft extension plans.
Our experienced team will install the scaffold, ensuring it meets all safety standards and regulations.
Throughout the duration of your project, we offer maintenance and adjustments to the scaffold as needed.

requestDetails.message: To proceed, could you please provide us with a few details?
details: The exact location of your bungalow.
The anticipated start date of the loft extension.
Any specific requirements or constraints we should be aware of.

nextSteps.message: Once we have this information, we can provide you with a detailed quote and timeline. Feel free to contact us if you have any questions or need further assistance.

closingMessage: We look forward to assisting you with your project!
